snippet: The market started to slump in late morning trading on news of downed helicopters and killed fighters in eastern Ukraine.
abstract: Stock market ends lower as surprisingly strong report on job gains fails to impress investors.
lead_paragraph: The market started to slump in late morning trading on news of downed helicopters and killed fighters in eastern Ukraine.

headline.main: Despite Strong Jobs Report, Shares Inch Lower After Mixed Earnings
headline.print_headline: Despite Strong Jobs Report, Shares Inch Lower After Mixed Earnings
